name: UpdateClickupList
description:
Update the details of a ClickUp list.

Use this tool to rename a ClickUp list, update its description, set a due date or time, change the priority, assign someone, or modify the list color.

parameters.name: list_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the ClickUp list to update. This is a required string field.

parameters.name: list_name
parameters.description: The new name for the ClickUp list. This should be a string value.

parameters.name: list_description_content
parameters.description: The plain text description to update for the ClickUp list. Use this instead of markdown for simple text updates.

parameters.name: formatted_list_description
parameters.description: Formatted description of the list using Markdown syntax instead of plain text.

value_schema.description: Use `markdown_content` instead of `content` to format your List description.

parameters.name: list_due_date
parameters.description: Set the list's due date as a Unix timestamp in milliseconds, representing the time the list is due.

parameters.name: list_priority
parameters.description: Set the list's priority as an integer. Usually, 1 is high, 2 is medium, and 3 is low priority.

parameters.name: list_assignee_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to assign to the list. Provide a valid user ID string.

parameters.name: list_color
parameters.description: Specify the color of the list. This refers to the List color rather than task statuses.

value_schema.description: **Status** refers to the List color rather than the task Statuses available in the List.

parameters.name: include_due_date_time
parameters.description: Set to true to include a specific time with the due date.

parameters.name: remove_list_color
parameters.description: Set to `true` to remove the List color; default is `false`.

value_schema.description: By default, this is `false.` To remove the List color use `unset_status: true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: markdown_content
parameters.description: Use `markdown_content` instead of `content` to format your List description.

value_schema.description: Use `markdown_content` instead of `content` to format your List description.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: **Status** refers to the List color rather than the task Statuses available in the List.

value_schema.description: **Status** refers to the List color rather than the task Statuses available in the List.

parameters.name: unset_status
parameters.description: By default, this is `false.` To remove the List color use `unset_status: true`.

value_schema.description: By default, this is `false.` To remove the List color use `unset_status: true`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
